metadata.description: We all know Spider-Man's origin - but what happened the day after Uncle Ben died? Find out in Spider-Man: 48 Hours! Also, see the life of MayDay before she became Spider-Girl with Mr. and Mrs. Spider-Man! Also, check out Aunt May, Agent of F.E.A.S.T. and a flashback to the birth of Spidey's nemesis, VENOM!
metadata.name: Amazing Spider-Man Family
